author: costin
msg: Fix bug in ResponseImpl - getWriter will set usingWriter=true

author: costin
msg: Jasper: clean up the class name mangling - there are only 2 reasons to
extract the version: when the servlet is restarted, or when the jsp is modified
and we need the class name.

author: costin
msg: Fix for the jaxp/no jaxp handling.
Tomcat will be able to run without jaxp - it will fully support jaxp if available,
of course, but if not we'll back up to the previous method.
This is required for apps that don't support jaxp yet.
